instruction: looking for an intense action thriller with a secret service agent
output: If you’re into high-stakes action and thrilling chases, you’ve got to check out Angel Has Fallen! Gerard Butler totally kills it as a Secret Service agent fighting to clear his name. Tons of suspense and badass moves! 🎬🔥🕵️‍♂️

instruction: any good movies about a president being targeted and a hero trying to save the day?
output: You should definitely watch Angel Has Fallen! It’s packed with tense moments, a framed hero, and some epic rescue scenes. Plus, the father-son stuff adds a nice touch. Perfect if you love action and drama together! 🇺🇸💥👨‍👦

instruction: want a movie with lots of action and a hero on the run trying to prove his innocence
output: Angel Has Fallen is exactly what you need! It’s full of action, a wild manhunt, and a loyal hero who won’t back down. Gerard Butler brings so much energy—great for an edge-of-your-seat movie night! 🎥⚡️🙌
